MultiFactorAuthentication.TITLE: Add extra security to your account
MultiFactorAuthentication.EXTRA_LAYER_DE: Every time you log into your account, you'll need your password and an additional form of verification.
MultiFactorAuthentication.UNIQUE_DESCRIP: This verification is only available to you. Even if someone gets your password, they will not be able to access your account.
MultiFactorAuthentication.NO_METHODS_REG: No MFA methods have been registered. Add one using the button below
This member has not registered any MFA methods yet
MultiFactorAuthentication.SETUP_COMPLETE: Multi-factor authentication is now set up
MultiFactorAuthentication.ACCOUNT_RESET_: Ensure that the person requesting a reset is the real person associated with this account before proceeding. An email will be sent to the member's address with a link to reset both their password and multi-factor authentication methods.
We were unable to send an email, please try again later.
MultiFactorAuthentication.DELETE_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to remove this method
MultiFactorAuthentication.RESET_ACCOUNT_: You are about to reset this account. Their password and multi-factor authentication will be reset. Continue?
MultiFactorAuthentication.RESET_BACKUP_C: All existing codes will be made invalid and new codes will be created
